i have a weapon that has a -->command called Death shadow<-- when you > right click it < how do i get it to do an animation when i click it

I WAS NOT ASKING FOR A SPEC! I WAS ASKING FOR A SPECIAL ANIMATION WHEN U CLICK ON THE WORDS " DEATH SHADOW " BAHHHHHH!

item.source: How do u getthings to do a timer spec

item.title: How do u getthings to do a timer spec
item.dc:creator: @tehlobbiescape tehlobbiescape
item.description:
@tehlobbiescape wrote:

If its like a spec you want, you just do this

} if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15334 && specialAmount <= 49) { // your weapon here specialDamage = 0; specialDamage2 = 0; sendMessage("You do not have enough special energy left."); } if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15334 && specialAmount >= 50) { // your weapon here startAnimation(2890); specialDamage = 40 + misc.random(5); specialAmount -= 50
Ok, where it says startAnimation, put the code in there to whatever you want and there, you got a special atack (also change the [playerweapon] == ##### to whatever it is

Read full topic
